tlsmode.ui:help: • disable: connects without TLS. • require: connects using TLS without verifying the CA certificate. • verify-ca: connects using TLS and confirms that the server certificate has been signed by the certificate authority. • verify-full: connects using TLS, confirms that the server certificate has been signed by the certificate authority, and verifies that the host name matches the name provided in the server certificate.

ca.ui:help: Optionally override the trusted CA certificates. Default is to trust the well-known CAs curated by Mozilla. Mozilla's CAs are completely replaced when CAs are explicitly specified using this option.
